title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked as dirty by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked as dirty by code assist
OB: When using code assist, if there are no suggestions available, the file is still marked as dirty, indicating that it has been modified, even though no changes have been made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty, as it creates confusion and unnecessary changes in version control.
